derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Middle High German larche, based on Latin larix

entry.def: A larch is a tree with needle-shaped leaves.

means.word_mean: 2. any of numerous conifers of the genus Larix all having deciduous needlelike leaves
